maqras.text: Jeho companion said Our Lord ja nie zmylit him; he bol daleko astray
He said nie feud Mna; ja sufficiently warned ona
Nothing zmenit teraz. Ja bol never unjust towards ludia
Je dni when my ziadat Hell Have ona had enough It say Dat mna inak
Raj offered righteous readily
This bol co promised kazdy repenter steadfast
They reverenced the Vela Gracious v ich privacy pojdem wholeheartedly
Zapisat it peace; this bol Dni Eternity
They get anything they zelat therein my have vecer inak
Vela generation them bol mocny my annihilated They hladanie zem; they zalozit escape
This bol lekcia everyone possesses zmyslanie bol able do hear svedok
My created heavens zem everything them 6 dni nie fatigue touched us
Therefore je chory v the face z ich utterances chvalit glorify tvoj Lord before sunrise before zapad slnka
night ona meditate Jeho vola sa after prostrating
chystat dni when caller vola sa miesto je zblizit sa
When they hear inevitable cry je dni ona pod
My bol jeden control zivot smrt; us bol zaverecny destiny
Dni pojdem when zem lamat v a ponahlajte sa dat vzostup them! Such zvolat je easy for us robit
My je fully aware z everything they utter chvila ona have power them. Therefore remind this Quran those reverence Moj warnings
blowing zranit
Bearing dazo
Bringing provisions
Distributing them mat rad commanded
Co promised ona iste pojdem ist okolo
Dni Judgment bol inevitable
Despite perfectly created sky
Ona zotrvat dispute truth
Deviating therefrom bol deviators
Woe do falsifiers
Do ich blundering they bol totally heedless
They question Dni Judgment
Dni they presented zapalit
Chut retribution; this bol co ona pouzivat challenge
righteous zasluzit zahrada jaro
They receive ich Lord's rewards they pouzivat bol zbozny
Zriedka robit they spat whole night
O dawn they prayed forgiveness
portion ich peniaze je set aside for zobrak chudobny
Zem bol full z znamenie those bol certain
znutra ona see
Do heaven bol tvoj provision everything promised ona
By Lord z heaven zem this je mat rad true mat rad lenze ona speak
Ona noted history Abraham's honorable guests
They visited him saying Peace. He said Peace ona strangers
He ziadat jeho rodina chystat fat calf
When he offered it them he poznamky ona nie jestn
He harbored fear z them! They said Have fear they dat dobry zvest z knowledgeable syn
Jeho manzelka astonished Noting ju zvrastit face ja bol sterile stara zensky
They said Thus said tvoj Lord He bol the Vela Wise Omniscient
